```{r}
# Set up 
library(tidyverse)
library(data.table) ## For the fread function
library(lubridate)
library(googledrive)
library(DT)

source("sepsis_monitor_functions.R")

#Read in sepsis data file from google drive
file_link <- "https://drive.google.com/file/d/1dYPoQSlCCo2LZqeBi8ia2oIhmCRI3rOF"
sepsis <- drive_read_string(file_link) %>%
  fread()


```

Table of current sepsis patients:

```{r}
sepsis %>%
  filter(SepsisLabel == 1) %>%
  select(PatientID, HR, Temp, Resp) %>%
  datatable()

```
